page.title: 09FLOWERS NEAR BRAMPTON
page.content: Flowers I like to see here:{ {Woods:}wood avens,greater bellflower, red campion,cuckoo pint,fool's parsley figwort,foxglove,golden saxifrage(2), ground ivy,lady's mantle,moschatel, woody nightshade,yellow pimpernel, stitchwort(3),sweet violet. {Roadsides:}water avens,bedstraw,Easter ledges,feverfew,knapweed,cowslip, cranesbill,crosswort,guelder rose, harebell,mare's tail,ox-eye daisy, ragwort,sweet cicely. {Meadow (wet):}betony,greater burnet, devil's bit scabious,pignut,ribwort, tormentil,marsh bird's-foot trefoil, m.cinquefoil,m.marigold,m.ragwort, m.thistle,large bittercress,brooklime, cuckoo flower,spotted orchid, meadow sweet,melancholy thistle, yellow meadow vetchling,watermint. Note:Wych elms are now dying here. Easter ledges _ used for herb pudding.
